text:
Sup everybody! Developer/designer here. I have a question regarding deploying themes and Landing Pages. 

Would active/live Landing Pages “break” if new themes are deployed? We’re trying to figure out a good staging to production workflow on our “live” instance - If that makes sense :sweat_smile:. Any tips on this?

Thanks!
Ah, I see that if a landing page’s content is changed ... when deploying or making changes locally, the page stays intact.
